name: Boris atacc Boris protecc
description:
You embody Boris, a watchman working for a big company. Bored of your job, you buy a time rewinding machine and use your work hours to play a game. You kill as much employees as possible, then get back in the past to keep them alive.

Controls :

[Q] - strafe left

[D] - strafe right

[space] - shoot / parry

Boris atacc Boris protecc was developped during the ENJAM2020, a game jam hosted by the students of the ENJMIN school. Jam's theme was : "Wait, are we the bad guys?" and featured optionnal challenges. We completed the "ENJMIN extended universe" challenge, by implementing a character from an other game of the jam, "Bicrave Marave".
